metadata.title: CVE-2017-18201 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - low
metadata.description:
An issue was discovered in GNU libcdio before 2.0.0. There is a double freein get_cdtext_generic() in lib/driver/_cdio_generic.c.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-18201` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libcdio-utils - 1.0.0-2ubuntu2
libcdio17 - 1.0.0-2ubuntu2
libiso9660-10 - 1.0.0-2ubuntu2
libudf0 - 1.0.0-2ubuntu2
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: libcdio package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.0.0-2ubuntu2').
